Name: Blind Girl
About the game: Blind Girl is a visual novel adventure game in which you explore the world to continue the story. The poor girl became blind after an evil witch took her eyes. Join her on an epic journey to retrieve them. Will she be able to find her eyes? Is everything really as it seems? Will there be a happy ending? Your choices affect the story. It is all up to you! *Key features Simple controls using the keyboard. Mysterious and beautiful graphics. A fairy tale-like story. 3 possible endings that are affected by the player's choices throughout the story.
